external_games.name: Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags
Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags

name: Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags
summary: Hello, I'm Dr. Sheldon Cooper, and welcome to Sheldon Cooper presents 'Fun with Flags'. So, fellow flag enthusiasts, what sort of flag questions keep you awake at night?" This a Fan, Fun, Educational, Parody, Pixel Game to test your vexology knowledge, you know, the study of flags, this funny trivia is based on popular tv show "Big Bang Theory"
